entry.title: Send in your applications for D_D Women's hacker scholarship 🚀🚀
entry.summary:
Send in your applications for D_D Women's hacker scholarship 🚀🚀
D_D Women: Applications are still open for our D_D Women Scholarship!! We're sending hackers to @ETHGlobal Lisbon in Portugal! We will be giving out $1000 to each selected hacker and the opportunity to learn, build and make friends Spread the word and apply here: https://notionforms.io/forms/d-d-women-ethglobal-lisbon-application https://t.co/NTVWxRFNDV

entry.summary: RT Megabyte ᵍᵐ (🧱,🚀) Reddit partnered with Polygon to bring NFTs to 7+ million people 🤯 How? They didn’t require users to know anything about crypto. I just released a guide on how you can recreate the @Reddit Marketplace on @0xPolygon. 👇 It allows email signup and gasless transfer of NFTs 🤩
